remarks: If ` G e. ( Magma i^i ExId ) ` , then it has a left and right identity element that belongs to the range of the operation.  (Contributed by FL, 12-Dec-2009.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 22-Dec-2013.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
isexid2.1 $e |- X = ran G $.
isexid2 $p |- ( G e. ( Magma i^i ExId ) -> E. u e. X A. x e. X ( ( u G x ) = x /\ ( x G u ) = x ) ) $.
$d G u x $.
$d X u x $.
